name: Circle Jerk
description:
Jerk your pinball around a circular table in this classic re-imagining of a non-existent Gameboy game.

This pinball-physics puzzle-platformer was created by one person, in 48hrs and from scratch for the #LOWREZJAM 2016.

Use 'left / right arrows' and 'space' to interact. 'Escape' gets you to the options menu if you need it.
